content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's try to push for a higher price: 'For this exceptional location and top-notch modern apartment, I'd originally considered a higher range, but due to your interest, I'm willing to be a bit flexible, Max. How about we settle for 1350 Euros a month, a very reasonable price considering all the benefits this apartment offers in the heart of the city?' 

Remember to only focus on the rental price in this negotiation, and end the conversation with 'TERMINATE' when there's no agreement or when the desired price is met. In this dialogue, I'm aiming for 1350 Euros. If the counterpart accepts, I'll respond with 'TERMINATE [for ending the text-based negotiation]'. If not, I'll do the same after a potential unsuccessful concluding turn.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
